definition: A group of individuals with extraordinary abilities who come together to fight against evil and protect the innocent. This term is commonly used in the context of fictional stories, particularly in the genre of comic books or superhero narratives.

examples.german: Die Superheldengruppe kämpft gegen das Böse.
examples.english: The superhero group fights against evil.
The superhero group has supernatural powers.

examples.german: Die Superheldengruppe rettet die Welt vor Gefahren.
examples.english: The superhero group saves the world from dangers.

examples.german: Die Superheldengruppe besteht aus verschiedenen Helden.
examples.english: The superhero group consists of different heroes.

examples.german: Die Superheldengruppe arbeitet zusammen, um Verbrechen zu bekämpfen.
examples.english: The superhero group works together to fight crime.
